C

checkLocation(Location) - Method in class main.Line
Given a Location checkLocation, check to see if the location falls on the Line (within STEPSIZE/2 units)
checkLocation(Location) - Method in class main.Player
Check to see if a given location is controlled by a player, within STEPSIZE units.
checkLocationValidity(Location) - Method in class main.GameBoard
Check to see if the location given is valid on the board
checkLose() - Method in class main.GameController
For all players, go through and see if the player has lost.
checkObjectLocation(GameObject) - Method in class main.GameController
Given a GameObject, check to see if the object is past the bounds of the gameboard.
Command - Class in main
The main.Command class is used to track the commands used to control a given turtle.
Command(String) - Constructor for class main.Command
Create a new object out of a string input.
commandInputs - Variable in class main.Command
The list of the actual input strings
commandList - Variable in class main.Command
The list of LocationChange that tracks what the commands do.
commands - Variable in class main.ViewApplication.PlayerTextFields

commandString - Variable in class main.Command
The full input
compareTo(Location) - Method in class main.Location
